title: Unable to input into "Connect:" field for PuTTY
author: JimmyTheRustler8
body_snippet:
When I open more than one tab I cannot click into the "Connect:" field to input another server for a new tab. It appears to be highlighting the text but when I type the output is displayed in my current active session, rather than the input field of the text box.

Has/is anyone else having this issue?

Thanks
J
